contents.content: 第四部分 特殊规则
第三章 独立主格结构
第三节 拓展练习10题
Creative discovery being pleasurable, humans have learned to find ways of milking this natural response.

contents.title: 在这种重要的时刻，因纽特人决定在解开北极气候变化的谜团中扮演更重要的角色。

contents.content: Yes, and he had this really long speech, with the stage all dark except for one spotlight.
Yet there is a dark side to this picture: despite our progress, half of the world's population still suffers, with water services inferior to those available to the ancient Greeks and Romans.
With a lightning ‘switch’ at their fingertips, materials scientists could find out what happens when mighty currents meet matter.
All things considered, I am sure to succeed this time.
Only basic instincts are carried in the genes of a newborn baby, other skills being learned from others in the community as the child grows up.
That's in a different mini bus with 18 places available.
Now beyond the car park, all the buildings are arranged in a half circle with a yard in the middle.
They finally succeeded in 1959 and there are now float plants all over the world, with each able to produce around 1,000 tons of glass every day, non-stop for around 15 years.
With so much at stake, the Inuit are determined to play a key role in teasing out the mysteries of climate change in the Arctic.
语法破解：这是一个简单句，Creative discovery being pleasurable是“名词+现在分词短语”的独立主格结构。
语法破解：这是一个简单句，with the stage all dark是“with+名词+形容词”的独立主格结构。
语法破解：这是由冒号连接的两个简单句组成的并列句，冒号前后的句子是对比关系。with water services inferior to those available to the ancient Greeks and Romans是“with+名词+形容词短语”的独立主格结构。
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。主句中的With a lightning ‘switch’ at their fingertips是“with+名词+介词短语”的独立主格结构；what引导的是宾语从句，作find out的宾语；该宾语从句中又包含一个由when引导的时间状语从句。
语法破解：这是一个简单句。All things considered是“名词+过去分词”的独立主格结构。
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。主句中的other skills being learned from others是“名词+现在分词短语”的独立主格结构，as引导的是时间状语从句。
语法破解：这是一个简单句，with 18 places available是“with+名词+形容词”的独立主格结构。
语法破解：这是一个简单句，with a yard in the middle是“with+名词+介词短语”的独立主格结构。
语法破解：这是由and连接的两个简单句组成的并列句，with each able to produce around 1,000 tons of glass every day是“with+名词+形容词短语”的独立主格结构。
语法破解：这是一个简单句。With so much at stake是“with+代词+介词短语”的独立主格结构。
